701964f-a.title: Bronx: Van Cortlandt Park ( - Saxon Avenue
701964f-a.text:
Van Cortlandt Park South, at the S.E. corner of Saxon Ave., showing the technical and test building (structure with flags) of the Radio Corporation of America occupying that site. The view is southwestward from Mosholu Parkway South (foreground).
May 8, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
701964f-a.folder: Van Cortlandt Park ( & Saxon Avenue, Bronx, NY
